pageProduct.name: Refresh Eye Drops 0.4mL 30
pageProduct.description:
Information

Why choose REFRESH??

REFRESH? Eye Drops

- For dry eye sufferers who need to treat dry eyes a few times a day

- Convenient single unit doses to fit in pocket or purse

- Ideal for on-the-go, in the car, on a plane or in the office

- Dry atmosphere in aircraft may cause dry eye - consider packing in your hand luggage

What is Dry Eye?

Dry Eye is a condition that occurs when your eyes either produce too few tears or the quality of your tears are poor. This can cause dryness, discomfort and may interfere with vision.

Symptoms of Dry Eye include: burning or stinging, gritty or foreign body sensation, and watery or blurry.

How to use REFRESH? Eye Drops

Step 1

Wash hands with soap and water; dry them with a clean towel. Tilt your head back with both eyes open and look at a point on the ceiling.

With your index finger, gently pull your lower eyelid to form a small pocket inside the eyelid.

Step 2

With the other hand, gently squeeze 1 drop into the pocket.

Do not allow the tip to come into contact with your eye.

Step 3

Slowly close both eyes, but do not blink or squeeze your eyes, and gently press the inner corners of your eyes (by your nose) with your fingers for about 2 minutes.

This will help the eye drops remain in your eye for a longer period.

Step 4

Gently blot extra drops from face with a damp cloth. Repeat steps 1-4 for the other eye.

Replace the cap immediately after use.

Drag to spin

General Information

Refresh Preservative Free Eye Drops help comforts irritated, dry and tired eyes. Suitable for all contact lens wearers.

Why Preservative Free?

Like so many people these days, you may be taking an active interest in your health - exercising, watching your weight and being more careful about the ingredients in all the products you use. REFRESH® eye drops are preservative free and will not cause allergies or adverse reactions associated with eye drop preservatives.

People with sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers can confidently use REFRESH® eye drops.

Why Sterile Single-Use Containers?

Eye drops are prone to bacterial contamination and are therefore generally discarded 4 weeks from the time of first opening the bottle. REFRESH® eye drops are different. Each single-use container remains sterile until it is opened. Therefore there is no need to discard REFRESH® eye drops like bottled eye drops.

Additionally, the single-use containers of REFRESH® eye drops are convenient and easy to carry.

REFRESH® eye drops provide comfortable relief of irritated, dry and tired eyes. They can also be used for in-eye re-wetting of contact lenses.

STERILE A.

Suitable For: All contact lens wearers.

Size: 30 x 0.4 mL

Warnings

For external use only. To avoid contamination, do not touch tip to any surface. If irritation persists or increases, discontinue use and consult your doctor.
Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Contains no antimicrobial agents.

Ingredients

Each mL contains: LIQUIFILM® (Polyvinyl Alcohol) 14mg and Povidone 6mg.

Directions

Make sure container is intact before use. To open: Completely twist off tab, then pull to remove.

USAGE ADVICE

Instill 1 drop into eye(s) as frequently as required and discard unused contents.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
